title: SKPath.Bounds returns the wrong result
body:
Hi!

I recently came across an issue of SKPath.GetBounds(out SKRect)

The following SVG was created in InkScape.
If you open it with that tool and select the single path that is containted, you'll see, that its bounds are actually exactly aligned with the x-axis (so x = 0)

However, SKPath.GetBounds() returns a "Left" value of "-16"

``` xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<!-- Created with Inkscape (http://www.inkscape.org/) -->

<svg
   xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"
   xmlns:cc="http://creativecommons.org/ns#"
   xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"
   xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   xmlns:sodipodi="http://sodipodi.sourceforge.net/DTD/sodipodi-0.dtd"
   xmlns:inkscape="http://www.inkscape.org/namespaces/inkscape"
   width="300mm"
   height="300mm"
   viewBox="0 0 1062.9921 1062.9921"
   id="svg2"
   version="1.1"
   inkscape:version="0.91 r13725"
   sodipodi:docname="Bends.svg">
  <title
     id="title4138">Vorlage</title>
  <defs
     id="defs4">
    <clipPath
       clipPathUnits="userSpaceOnUse"
       id="clipPath7866">
      <path
         d="m 54,769.8 486.96,0 0,-677.4 -486.96,0 0,677.4 z"
         id="path7868"
         inkscape:connector-curvature="0"
         style="clip-rule:evenodd" />
    </clipPath>
    <clipPath
       clipPathUnits="userSpaceOnUse"
       id="clipPath7856">
      <path
         d="m 54,769.8 0,0 486.96,0 0,-677.4 -486.96,0 0,677.4 z"
         id="path7858"
         inkscape:connector-curvature="0"
         style="clip-rule:evenodd" />
    </clipPath>
    <clipPath
       clipPathUnits="userSpaceOnUse"
       id="clipPath7816">
      <path
         d="m 54,769.8 486.96,0 0,-677.4 -486.96,0 0,677.4 z"
         id="path7818"
         inkscape:connector-curvature="0"
         style="clip-rule:evenodd" />
    </clipPath>
    <clipPath
       clipPathUnits="userSpaceOnUse"
       id="clipPath7826">
      <path
         d="m 540.96,769.8 0,-677.4 -486.96,0 0,677.4 486.96,0 z"
         id="path7828"
         inkscape:connector-curvature="0"
         style="clip-rule:evenodd" />
    </clipPath>
  </defs>
  <sodipodi:namedview
     id="base"
     pagecolor="#ffffff"
     bordercolor="#666666"
     borderopacity="1.0"
     inkscape:pageopacity="0.0"
     inkscape:pageshadow="2"
     inkscape:zoom="5.6568544"
     inkscape:cx="29.882178"
     inkscape:cy="1028.4464"
     inkscape:document-units="px"
     inkscape:current-layer="bends_solid_001"
     showgrid="true"
     objecttolerance="10"
     gridtolerance="10"
     inkscape:window-width="1536"
     inkscape:window-height="801"
     inkscape:window-x="1912"
     inkscape:window-y="-8"
     inkscape:window-maximized="1"
     inkscape:snap-smooth-nodes="true"
     inkscape:object-nodes="true"
     inkscape:snap-others="true"
     inkscape:snap-bbox="false">
    <inkscape:grid
       type="axonomgrid"
       id="grid4136"
       units="px"
       empspacing="5"
       spacingy="20.000001" />
  </sodipodi:namedview>
  <metadata
     id="metadata7">
    <rdf:RDF>
      <cc:Work
         rdf:about="">
        <dc:format>image/svg+xml</dc:format>
        <dc:type
           rdf:resource="http://purl.org/dc/dcmitype/StillImage" />
        <dc:title>Vorlage</dc:title>
      </cc:Work>
    </rdf:RDF>
  </metadata>
  <g
     id="bends_solid_001"
     transform="translate(17.320509,30.000003)">
    <path
       style="fill:none;fill-rule:evenodd;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:2;stroke-linecap:butt;stroke-linejoin:miter;stroke-miterlimit:4;stroke-dasharray:none;stroke-opacity:1"
       d="m -6.2157825e-7,-25.814698 c -34.64102137842175,19.9999998 0,40 0,40 l 0,0 0,0"
       id="path4304"
       inkscape:connector-curvature="0"
       sodipodi:nodetypes="cccc" />
  </g>
</svg>
```

Seems that there is some bug in the SKPath binding? (is that possible?)
